subject: The Skinny: Wednesday, May 9, 2007
body:

Paying More For Less At The Pump
Rising gas prices aren't the only way you're getting pinched at the 
      pump. The Wall Street Journal reports on 
      allegations of insider trading involving shares of its parent company. 
      And Northern Ireland makes history, but not the front pages. 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...


Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
